LanguageData.MeltSugar.label: melting sugary substances
LanguageData.MeltSugar.description: Boiling down high sugar substances into a sugar substitute residue Produces 5.
LanguageData.MeltSugar.jobString: Boiling down sugary substances into sugar residue.
LanguageData.MakeSugar.label: grind sugarcane
LanguageData.MakeSugar.description: Beat and grind those canes to get at that sugar! Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeFlour.label: grind flour
LanguageData.MakeFlour.description: Grind wheat, corn, rice or oats into flour. Produces 10.
LanguageData.CraftCornmeal.label: grind corn
LanguageData.Makesoymilk.label: press soy milk
LanguageData.Makesoymilk.description: Press beans into soy milk. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeChocolate.label: Cook chocolates
LanguageData.MakeChocolate.description: Roast cocoa beans and sugar to make chocolate, a sweet treat. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeCaramel.label: Caramelize sugar
LanguageData.MakeCaramel.description: Turns sugar into a caramel snacks. Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakeBread.label: bake bread loaves
LanguageData.Makecheese.label: process cheese
LanguageData.Makecheese.description: Turns milk or soy milk into cheese. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeTofu.label: press tofu
LanguageData.MakeTofu.description: Turns beans into tofu. Tofu is used in place of meat in meals or can be eaten raw. Produces 5.
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.label: split coconuts
LanguageData.HalfCoconut.description: Splits coconuts into two and harvests the milk from the fruit. Produces 5.
